message.content: This question requires some knowledge about geological processes and the formation of natural landmarks. The Grand Canyon is estimated to have taken millions of years to form through the erosion caused by the Colorado River. Option (A) is incorrect because a few days is not a sufficient amount of time for such a massive geological formation. Option (C) and (D) are incorrect because they do not relate to the formation of the Grand Canyon, but rather to the cost or time duration in a different context. Option (B) is the correct answer as it aligns with the scientific understanding of the formation of the Grand Canyon.
